command.enableGradient.title: Enable Titlebar Gradient
command.disableGradient.title: Disable Titlebar Gradient
configuration.title: Colorful Titlebar
configuration.hashSource.projectName.des: Generate color hash from project folder name only
configuration.hashSource.fullPath.descri: Generate color hash from complete project path, so same project in different locations will have different colors
configuration.hashSource.projectNameDate: Generate color hash from project name and date, making it unique everyday
configuration.lightThemeColors.descripti: Colors to generate gradient for project-based titlebar color selection in light themes. Supports `#RRGGBB`, `#RRGGBBAA`, `rgb(R,G,B)`, `rgba(R,G,B,A)`, `hsl(H,S,L)`, `hsla(H,S,L,A)`
configuration.darkThemeColors.descriptio: Colors to generate gradient for project-based titlebar color selection in dark themes. Supports `#RRGGBB`, `#RRGGBBAA`, `rgb(R,G,B)`, `rgba(R,G,B,A)`, `hsl(H,S,L)`, `hsla(H,S,L,A)`
configuration.projectIndicators.descript: File or directory names (will not trim) that indicate a project directory
configuration.workbenchCssPath.descripti: Path to the "workbench.desktop.main.css" file. Need to modify it to enable gradient
